description: Displays and manages attachment configuration settings for the forum
Displays and manages attachment quota limits for user groups
Creates a new quota limit for file attachments
Updates or deletes existing quota limits for attachments
Displays and manages attachment extension groups
Creates a new extension group for file attachments
Updates or deletes existing attachment extension groups
Displays and manages individual file extensions for attachments
Creates a new file extension entry for attachments
Updates or deletes existing file extension entries
Assigns quota limits to specific user groups
